posts._title: Ulrich Seidl – Spass ohne Grenzen AKA Fun without Limits (1998)
posts.title: Spass ohne Grenzen
posts.excerpt: Quote:Whether in the countryside or on the edge of the city, amusement parks or fun fairs are hot across Europe. Their names, amusement parks and fun fairs, say it all: People want to be amused, they want to have fun. For example, at the Europark in southern Germany a dummy with a contorted face sits …

posts._title: Kazuo Hara – Nippon Asbest Village AKA Sennan Asbestos Disaster (2016)
posts.title: Nippon Asbest Village
posts.excerpt: Ten years in the making, Kazuo Hara’s three-and-a-half-hour-long epic is a longitudinal study of asbestos victims demanding reparations from a heartless state. Hara records the eight-year struggle of the plaintiffs and their lawyers. A dogged and dramatic depiction of their intense battle.

posts._title: Ulrich Seidl – Die letzten Männer AKA The Last Real Men [Uncut Version] (1994)
posts.title: Die letzten Männer
posts.excerpt: Quote:The Last Real Men (Die letzten Männer) is an hour-long piece following the Viennese teacher Karl S. on his search for a wife who doesn’t question traditional gender roles and “doesn’t talk back”. In so doing, Seidl probes the motives that make Austrian men look for wives in Thailand and the Philippines.

posts.title: Hollywood Story
posts.excerpt: Hollywood 1950: The successful producer Larry O’Brian arrives in Los Angeles to found a motion picture company. He buys an old studio which was unused since the days of silent movies. He’s shown the office where the famous director Franklin Farrara was shot. The case hasn’t been solved until now, although there were many suspects. …

posts.title: Stadt der verlorenen Seelen

posts._title: George Barry – Death Bed: The Bed That Eats (1977)
posts.title: Death Bed: The Bed That Eats

posts.title: Aa bakudan

posts.title: The Breaking Point
posts.excerpt: Quote:Based on a novel by Laurence Meynell, this film tells of a young businessman from England who who gets involved in a scheme to inundate a small communist country in the Middle East with counterfeit money.
